DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim compare two different type supraglottic device tracheal intubation patient undergo elective surgery general anesthesia . Our hypothesis use I-gel supraglottic airway result high first attempt success rate blind tracheal intubation .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison LMA-Fastrach I-gel Blind Tracheal Intubation .
DOC.detailed_description: Supraglottic airway device LMA-Fastrach I-gel provide patent airway general anesthesia . The LMA-Fastrach design provide conduit blind fiberoptically guide tracheal intubation . However , success rate tracheal intubation first attempt device varies 50 87 % . The I-gel newer device airway management , wide bore , allow direct passage tracheal tube . Recent study suggest I-gel easy insert limit experience need high success insertion rate obtain . In prospective randomized study , evaluate performance device tracheal intubation patient undergo elective surgery general anesthesia .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old ASA physical status 13 Patients undergo elective surgery general anesthesia , require endotracheal intubation ASA physical status 45 Contraindications muscle relaxation Anticipated know difficult intubation ventilation Patients limit mouth opening ( le 2 cm ) Patients increase risk aspiration , history symptomatic gastroesophageal reflux hiatal hernia .
